name: Song Animals
description: A surreal journey of strange animals through hand-painted watercolour worlds set to a relaxing soundtrack
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 500 MHz Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 140 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
